string.name: account_linked_message
string.font: Your Google Account has been added.

string.name: syncing_message
string.font: "Google applications are syncing data now. "" "%i The ”syncing” icon is displayed in the Status bar at the top of your screen, to indicate that data is being synchronised from your Google Account. The first sync may take several minutes, depending on the volume of contacts, emails, calendar events and other Google app data.

resources.string: Sign in with your Google Account

"Many Google and Android features require a Google Account.
Touch "Next to sign in with an existing Google Account or create a new Google Account now. Or touch Skipto simply start using your Android device. You can sign in to a Google Account later in Settings, under Accounts & sync.

Adding an account"
You can use more than one Google Account (such as your home and work accounts). Adding a Google Account takes just a few steps.
Touch “Next” to continue or press the Back button to exit."
Gathering information about your phone. This could take up to 30 seconds.

"You need to add a Google mail account.
You already have a Google mail username ("^1") associated with this account, but it is not currently active.
Touch “Next” to reactivate this username and use it.
Or, if you want to use a different account, press the Back button and sign in with or create a different account."
The following information will help you recover your password if it is ever lost
"The email address entered is not valid. Example: joe@example.co.uk"
Recovery address cannot be the same as the one that you are creating

"You can use your Google Account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data. If you've previously backed up your data with this account, you can restore it to this device now."
You can use your Google Account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data.
You can change your data backup settings in the Settings application, under Privacy.
Keep this device backed up with my Google Account
Restore data from my Google Account to this device
If you have previously backed up your settings, they will be restored.
Your settings will not be restored from back up.
Restoring data, this may take a few minutes.
